event.title: Steve Sanderson - ASP.NET Core and Single Page Apps
event.description:
Steve Sanderson created knockout.js before client-side MVC was cool. He now works at Microsoft on the team that just released ASP.NET Core 1.0 - the new open-source, cross-platform version of ASP.NET.

Along the way he helped develop the Azure Portal - one of the largest Single Page Applications (SPA) in the world.

So who better to talk about building SPAs with ASP.NET Core?
